codeSystems.name: RefMartCountryList
codeSystems.title: WHO RefMart Jurisidiction List
codeSystems.description: CodeSystem for WHO Refmart Country and Jurisidiction List available at https://xmart-api-public.who.int/REFMART/REF_COUNTRY

codeSystems.name: Actors
codeSystems.title: WHO GDHCN Trust Actors CodeSystem
codeSystems.description: CodeSystem for SMART Trust actors that has usage codes for verification keys published to the Trust Network as defined by the [certificate governance](concepts_certificate_governance.html)

codeSystems.name: Domains
codeSystems.title: WHO GDHCN Trust Domains
codeSystems.description: CodeSystem for define WHO GDHCN Trust Domains.

codeSystems.name: KeyUsage
codeSystems.title: WHO GDHCN Key Usage CodeSystem
codeSystems.description: CodeSystem for GDHCN Key Usage that has usage codes for verification keys published to the Trust Network as defined by the [certificate governance](concepts_certificate_governance.html)

codeSystems.name: Participants
codeSystems.title: WHO GDHCN Trust Network Participants CodeSystem
codeSystems.description: CodeSystem for GDHCN Trust Network Participants which are not already included in the ISO-3166 three letter code system

codeSystems.name: Transactions
codeSystems.title: WHO GDHCN Transactions CodeSystem
codeSystems.description: CodeSystem for GDHCN transactions that has usage codes for verification keys published to the Trust Network as defined by the [certificate governance](concepts_certificate_governance.html)
